data.name: Ultrawings 2
data.description:
Ultrawings is back and it's bigger and better than ever!  Return to the skies in 5 all-new aircraft as you complete hundreds of missions across a beautifully stylized, island-themed world!

MOTION CONTROLS!

Our ground-breaking motion control system returns! Use your virtual hands to fully interact and control your aircraft. 

TONS OF GAMEPLAY!

You'll be unlocking new gameplay throughout the 40 - 60 hour game! One minute you'll be dogfighting enemy bogies in a WW2-era warplane and the next you'll be popping balloons with a dart pistol in the Ultralight.  Up to 8-players online multiplayer too!

FEATURES

-- Pilot 5 unique aircraft (including a helicopter!) using your virtual hands for an incredibly immersive experience!

-- Explore all-new, hand-crafted islands.  Each island is about 3x larger than the ones in Ultrawings!

-- The world is teeming with life! 

-- Fly during day, night, dusk, and overcast conditions.

-- 8-player multiplayer!

Welcome back to Ultrawings, Pilot!

changelog.change_log: -- Added Always Point option to Game Options.  This keeps the your index finger permanently pointed for interactions.
- Fixed an issue with the life system.
-- Added the ability to turn off ambient vehicles in the Options menu.  This will slightly increase performance across the board.

Build notes:

-- Added the ability to skip landing in almost all missions in the game.  The catch here is that the highest medal you can earn is a Silver even if you earn a Gold medal in the mission your medal will be reduced to a Silver if you skip the landing.

-- If you earn Gold medals in all of the Ultralight license missions you'll have enough to purchase the Stallion.

-- Once you purchase ONE airport on a new island you can fast travel to that island.  You no longer need to purchase BOTH airports to unlock fast travel.

- A bunch of new gold, silver, and bronze medal VO lines.  The snark is REAL.

-- Lots of various bug fixes.
